channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gardening: Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bicycles: Daddy Pig teaches Peppa to ride her bicycle without stabilisers - just like her friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig gives Peppa a special box to store secret things, in 'Secrets', and then in 'Flying a Kite', Peppa, George and Daddy Pig discover that it's not very easy to fly a kite on a windy day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George feed bread to the ducks and Daddy Pig is chased by a wasp in 'Picnic', then in 'Musical Instruments', Peppa, Mummy and Daddy all find an instrument to play. But what about George.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George play at being different creatures in 'Frogs and Worms and Butterflies', and then in 'Dressing Up', Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa gets shiny new red shoes and never, ever wants to take them off in 'New Shoes', and then in 'The School Fete', Peppa loves the school fete. There's so much to do.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa, George and Daddy Pig prepare a wonderful birthday surprise for 'Mummy Pig's Birthday', and then in 'The Tooth Fairy', Peppa is surprised to find her lost tooth is replaced by a shiny coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's family car breaks down, so while it is being mended they borrow another one in 'The New Car', and then in 'Treasure Hunt', Granny and Grandpa Pig bury treasure in their garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Trees; Canoe Trip: Two episodes.

channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A Day With Doctor Hamster; Playgroup Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nature Class: Nanny Plum takes the Fairy children for a nature class in the woods, and bumps into the Wise Old Elf who is teaching a nature class to the Elf children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help make a giant pizza in 'The Crew Builds A Pizza Parlor', then in 'The Crew Builds An Airport Road', the crew fixes Speed Meister's wonky road. (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The pals search for who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home in 'The Case of the Blue Bandit', then in 'The Honey Badger Break-In', Sweetie sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Mermaid Cruise Ship: All aboard the S.S. MerCat! It's time to go on a mermaid-tastic cruise with Gabby and Pandy, as they cruise to Mermaid Cove, where they see a special show! (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is feeling unwell and Doctor Brown Bear says she must stay in bed in 'Not Very Well', then in 'Windy Castle', Peppa and her family visit Windy Castle, where the view is fantastic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: My Cousin Chloe; Babysitting: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Queen Bakes Cakes: A cake sale is organised to mend the magic school, but Queen Thistle is baking and no-one can eat her cakes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard's Rainbow: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fox Cubs: There is a new fox cub leader in The Little Kingdom - Nanny Plum. But whilst trying to earn their adventure badges the fox cubs find themselves stuck at the top of a mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef makes a homemade recipe in 'Ice Cream', then in 'Pasta & Sauce', Chef makes Brody Bambino's pasta sauce recipe. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan in 'Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan', then in 'Pups Save A Turbot Tournament', the pups must save Tilly during the Turbot Tournament. (S10, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games; Caravan Friends: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops: Peppa is playing with Freddy Fox at his home, in an apartment above the shops. Peggi and Pandora Panda, and Candy Cat live there too, and help show Peppa around. (S7, ep 30).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Happily Ever After: At the playgroup, Madame Gazelle is reading a story, but a page is missing so she makes up an ending. During playtime, the children make up their own endings too! (S7, ep 35).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.
